item.description:
07 Nov 12:53
jb-compose-bot
v1.2.1
2156780
This commit was created on GitHub.com and signed with GitHub’s verified signature.
GPG key ID: 4AEE18F83AFDEB23
Learn about vigilant mode.
Compare
Choose a tag to compare
View all tags
1.2.1 Latest
Latest

Common

Fixes

  • Fix kotlinCompilerPlugin property
  • Fix runDistributable fails in v1.2.0-beta01
  • Fix Packaging fails on JDK-19

Desktop

Fixes

  • Fix duplicate definition of resource file when running packageRelease
  • Fix support of GPU's which don't support DirectX 12 (Windows)

Web

Fixes

  • Support Kotlin 1.7.20

Updated dependencies

This version of Compose Multiplatform is based on the next Jetpack Compose libraries:

  • Compiler 1.3.2
  • Runtime 1.2.1
  • UI 1.2.1
  • Foundation 1.2.1
  • Material 1.2.1
  • Material3 1.0.0-alpha14
Assets 2
25 people reacted
yfn020, Serendipithub, willflier, pankaj-nikam, ltttttttttttt, kaleidot725, 070hm, zicheng2019, ShreckYe, and Tachi107 reacted with thumbs up emoji yfn020, Serendipithub, willflier, 070hm, and zicheng2019 reacted with laugh emoji alexjpwalker, Kanialdo, williamwebb, sphrak, sureshg, yfn020, octogene, mpetuska, TaehoonLeee, InsanusMokrassar, and 9 more reacted with hooray emoji yfn020, Serendipithub, willflier, 070hm, xxfast, and zicheng2019 reacted with heart emoji yfn020, InsanusMokrassar, Serendipithub, willflier, sureshg, 070hm, and zicheng2019 reacted with rocket emoji
